DTH

Technologies Used: Java EE, JPA, HTML5, CSS3, Eclipse IDE & Derby Database

Description

I worked in a team to build design changes and add functionalities for the DTH website, using the latest MPEG-4 technology to increase broadcast activity. Our tasks included implementing payment option features for different package services, a login system for different types of users (admin, vendor and customer). To improve methods for data editing and re-designing the website with a new, modern look. I led the feature development, putting these into various panels, to implement the payment model for the customers and a design solution for admins and vendors to manipulate data in a simpler way. Screenshots of the websites are down below.
